pullrequest.title: Get/Set user camera pose in GUI (#1595)

content.raw:
The `camera_pose` field, unlike the other properties currently under scene, is not a field of [scene.proto](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e938f3e1ab731b38245bdb8449e3bdc029f753e2/gazebo/msgs/scene.proto). Therefore, the other fields are published in a message and changing them on one `gzclient` affects other `gzclient`s, unlike `camera_pose`.

Since on SDF the camera pose is described inside [<world><gui><camera>](http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=world#world_gui), what do you think of creating a new field in the World Tree above `Scene` called `GUI` and inside it put `camera`, which expanded has a read-only `name == user_camera` and an editable `pose` field?
